Need For Speed World DirectPlay WW- PC | ENG | Electronic Arts EA Box | Black e EA Singapore | 2010 | 930 MB Gênero: Arcade / Racing (Cars) / 3D / Online-only / Massively multiplayer Need for Speed: World Online shooter de acção colectiva para o PC da famosa série de corrida com um sistema de classificação complexo, e facilita a criação de redes jogadores. Os jogadores serão capazes de equipa e desafiar os rivais ea polícia em várias rotas em diferentes modos de jogo coletivo.

Personally, for safety reasons, if you can download this from the official site and get the same thing, I'd rather do that then download it from an underground site 'cause of the risk of trojan horses being stuck inside the copy.  Call me paranoid, but wouldn't you rather get it from the official site versus downloading it from an underground site where viruses and trojans are known to appear from time to time?  And I'm not talking about false positives either!  Just food for thought, folks.  And just my humble 2 cents.  ;)  Happy gaming!

I don't see any point in keeeping this torrent alive.The  nfo says u have to  register in the website.Well once u register and try launching the game,it will ask if u would like to download updates along with a warning that if u don't update u can't play it.So well this is now simply a waste of bandwidth.Moreover once u register, the site asks if u want to download it.So guys better register here http://world.needforspeed.com/register and then start downloading the game rather than using this torrent.As always there could be some undetected trojans in the compliation,which is always a risk.I hope if other ppl have some opinion ... please share ....
